No help no information and no effort to try to sort it out. So all and all they are very tough on scripters bots and cheaters, whether you actually cheated or not. 

Literally the only response u get from riot about the matter 

"Your account has been permanently suspended following the use of scripts, hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs in League of Legends. Accounts that are caught using hacks to gain an unfair competitive advantage are subject to permanent suspension. We work hard to preserve a fair and competitive environment in League of Legends. Regardless of intent, use of unauthorized third-party programs is explicitly against the Terms of Use, which can be found here:

NA: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse

Keep in mind that account sharing of any kind is also against the Terms of Use. You are responsible for all activity on your account, so be sure to keep your account information to yourself.

We won't be able to go into the specifics of an account's exploit abuse, as divulging this information could compromise future investigations. Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns."
Please separate your thoughts into a few sentences and employ punctuation.  Your comment is a bit difficult to follow.

This, actually happened to me, on my account which I spent an obscenely large amount of money on, and never scripted nor hacked, I wouldn't even KNOW where to begin on hacking and scripting and didn't even know what it was until recently, they REFUSED to tell me what I was being banned over just repeated this same stuff above, when I said, I might of been hacked or something because I didn't do anything like that. Their response was "Nope, This was you." I was treated pretty much the exact same way as you bro. I have always played fair in every game ive ever played, been avidly against hackers as they ruin everyone else's fun. Not only this but I'm a very trashy player, I'm VERY bad at the game and yet they claim I'm a hacker. Like do my scores and games reflect someone who's hacking? like half the games ive been in ive been negative. Not only was I doing poorly but I hadn't played league in the period of time they said I was. I was falsely PERMANENTLY banned for something I had never done, I did use Discord and Communication programs but they claim that's not why I was banned. Eventually I just said what the fuck ever when they said they WILL not be refuting this ban or even remotely willing to hear me out. Apparently no proof I give them will help if they won't tell me what program I'm being suspected in using. I was a model player who never really trash talked anyone. Never was toxic, and pretty much made friends with almost everyone I talked to in game. Yet I got permanently banned. Some of the little assholes in this game never get banned for being toxic or punished in the slightest yet I never do anything warranting banning, and I'm the one banned. Not to mention I also roamed the forums and answered questions, got several friends into league and bought hundreds of $ worth of skins. All to be treated by riot support like it's a done deal and not even willing to tell me what it was over.
 To this day I wonder what I was banned for. As I was never told exactly

I'm the same as you. They said I was scripting and banned me. Then I made another account and it got instabanned. I asked what for and got no details. I spent over $2000 and asked if I could have a probation period and you tell me what I'm doing and they said no. They should at least give a warning so that I'm not banned out of the blue with no idea of what I got banned for.

Yeah man I was in the exact same boat with my EUW account.

I even abandoned this gaming name after trying to convince Riot for more than 6 months that I didn't do what they accused me of (didn't really even know exactly what I was accused of), out of the pure frustration and depression it brought back just seeing the name about the scenario I was put in.

Also spent thousands on the account (not to mention the time), so it wouldn't even make sense jeopardizing something so valuable through cheating, even though I have no idea how to, also my account was Bronze and barely reached Silver before the ban, I mean I don't even cheat on normal offline games for the sake of not ruining the gaming experience.

Tried to open a thread and suggested some alternatives (because support told me if it could get enough publicity there is a small chance they could consider and implement something similar to my suggestions) to the ban like fines or account restrictions just so I wouldn't lose everything I worked for so long, even though I never did what I was accused of. 

But as always every person in the community directly brands you as a cheater and shoots and burns your thoughts down if Riot says you cheated.

I also browsed the forums and people always stated they only used "this" tool or "that" tool, yet I didn't even have anything remotely close to that on the PC's that I used to play League with.

I regularly bought RP because I enjoyed the game so much and didn't mind contributing towards it. So I could never and probably never will understand why this would be done to me, I never even had a chat ban or anything remotely to that, so I considered myself as a model player.

But I did understand that they couldn't give me details to my ban, for the reasons you guys mentioned, but that just added onto the frustration.

This is unacceptable, RIOT FIX THIS PROCESS, BANNED PEOPLE DESERVE MORE COMMUNICATION REGARDING THEIR BAN, HOW DARE YOU THROW AWAY THEIR MONEY AND TIME FOR A CRIME THEY DIDN'T COMMIT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Will you ever add more champions to the rotation? Since league is gaining more champions each year, it takes longer to get champions on the rotation again.

10 is a reasonable number. It means that if, for some bizarre reason, all players don't own any champs that every single one has two options. 

It's more or less for new players anyway, and thus makes it easier for them to explore and find their favorite in a smaller cluster of 10 champions than a larger one of say 12 or 15.

I think there should be more then 10 for new players to experiment and test more and all in all have fun with the game if they only have a choice between 10/130(ish) it becomes like a job to play league and get IP to champs you will have fun with for a few days.
